thread.title: Managed Services Provider Tel-Networks USA Adds SureView Insider Threat Solution to Existing Solution Portfolio
thread.title_full: Managed Services Provider Tel-Networks USA Adds SureView Insider Threat Solution to Existing Solution Portfolio

title: Managed Services Provider Tel-Networks USA Adds SureView Insider Threat Solution to Existing Solution Portfolio
text:
[October 15, 2015] Managed Services Provider Tel-Networks USA Adds SureView Insider Threat Solution to Existing Solution Portfolio 
AUSTIN, Texas , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Raytheon|Websense today announced that Tel-Networks USA has added the SureViewÂ® Insider Threat solution to their portfolio of cohesive and sustainable information technology infrastructure solutions. Tel-Networks USA specializes in providing organizations with Full Life Cycle services in Unified Communications both on Premise and Hosted, Virtualization, Network Server and Data Center Design and Full Private Cloud Hosted solutions to increase productivity and improve business operations. 
"Tel-Networks USA is the first Managed Services Provider to implement SureView Insider Threat," stated Ed Hammersla , Raytheon|Websense chief strategy officer and president, Federal. "We are excited about the potential to provide Tel-Networks' large customer base with the unprecedented enterprise-wide visibility and context around end-user activity that this products provides. Wih its ability to protect intellectual property, investigate potential fraud, ensure compliance, and avoid liabilities and brand damage, SureView Insider Threat is a great fit with Tel-Networks' goals to prevent downtime and optimize information technology investment." 
"Tel-Networks USA is committed to providing best of breed technology solutions to its customers. Our partnership with Raytheon|Websense further strengthens our commitment to provide our clients cutting edge technology to serve their businesses," stated Michael Branca , President of Tel-Networks USA. "We see cybersecurity as a top priority for our clients. The extensive Raytheon|Websense portfolio of cyber products, including SureView Insider Threat, provides them the platform they need to protect their organizations, customer base and investors. Our ability to provide SureView Insider Threat as either on premise or a hosted application model for our clients, provides them flexibility and the ability to deploy these applications easily in the model that best suits their business requirements." 
About Raytheon|Websense On May 29, 2015 , Raytheon Company (NYSE: RTN) and Vista Equity Partners completed a joint venture transaction creating a new company that combines Websense, a Vista Equity portfolio company, and Raytheon Cyber Products, a product line of Raytheon's Intelligence, Information and Services business. The newly-formed commercial cybersecurity company will be known on an interim basis as Raytheon|Websense. The company expects to introduce a new brand identity upon completion of standard organizational integration activity.
